comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 3 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: juba.revlink.pro
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://juba.revlink.pro/gHVQv](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fjuba.revlink.pro%2FgHVQv) ### Comment > 普通に進めれば再現できると思うが、何度も検証していると急に広告が出てこなくなって自分では再現不可になった。 > > また、AdGuardがオンの時の画像3枚目だが、出てくる時と出てこない時がある。 > 出てくる条件は不明、ランダムだと思う。 > 広告をクリックすることで秒数カウントが始まる仕掛けなのだろうが、広告をガードしてるので進めなくなる。 > 何故か急にカウントが始まり進める場合もあるが、よくわからない。 > そもそも広告をクリックせずにカウントが始まる時もあるし、広告をクリックしてもカウントが始まらない場合もある。 > それがAdGuardによるものかも、そもそもわからない。 ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/fzc3sm8qkco4gko4wo084wswwsg84cw4nyccei98mg.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/kp1uyvaqew0ksoso0oco0so80g8sscsmw1e35h7740.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 3 ![Screenshot 3](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/l9aljez7rm88s0go8k0sc4wk0kc848w4lvj3exbje0.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/64vnu8rvqloogcw08oocckcgs04ko4cd7vlt807tzw.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser Extension v5.1.139 MV2 System version: | `Windows 10` Browser: | Firefox Tracking protection: | **General settings**:
Block trackers,
Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header

**Tracking methods**:
Self-destructing third-party cookies (2880) Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection

Annoyances:
AdGuard Cookie Notices,
AdGuard Popups,
AdGuard Mobile App Banners,
AdGuard Other Annoyances,
AdGuard Widgets

Security:
Online Malicious URL Blocklist

Language-specific:
AdGuard Japanese Browsing Security: | disabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?product_type=ext&product_version=5.1.139&system_version=Windows+10&manifest_version=2&browser=firefox&filters=2.3.7.18.19.20.21.22.208&browsing_security.enabled=false&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=false&stealth.enabled=true&stealth.hide_search_queries=true&stealth.DNT=true&stealth.third_party_cookies=2880&stealth.block_trackers=true)

### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://juba.revlink.pro/gHVQv](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fjuba.revlink.pro%2FgHVQv) ### Comment > 普通に進めれば再現できると思うが、何度も検証していると急に広告が出てこなくなって自分では再現不可になった。 > > また、AdGuardがオンの時の画像3枚目だが、出てくる時と出てこない時がある。 > 出てくる条件は不明、ランダムだと思う。 > 広告をクリックすることで秒数カウントが始まる仕掛けなのだろうが、広告をガードしてるので進めなくなる。 > 何故か急にカウントが始まり進める場合もあるが、よくわからない。 > そもそも広告をクリックせずにカウントが始まる時もあるし、広告をクリックしてもカウントが始まらない場合もある。 > それがAdGuardによるものかも、そもそもわからない。 ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/fzc3sm8qkco4gko4wo084wswwsg84cw4nyccei98mg.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/kp1uyvaqew0ksoso0oco0so80g8sscsmw1e35h7740.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 3 ![Screenshot 3](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/l9aljez7rm88s0go8k0sc4wk0kc848w4lvj3exbje0.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/64vnu8rvqloogcw08oocckcgs04ko4cd7vlt807tzw.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser Extension v5.1.139 MV2 System version: | `Windows 10` Browser: | Firefox Tracking protection: | **General settings**:
Block trackers,
Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header

**Tracking methods**:
Self-destructing third-party cookies (2880) Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection

Annoyances:

AdGuard Popups,
AdGuard Mobile App Banners,
AdGuard Other Annoyances,
AdGuard Widgets

Security:
Online Malicious URL Blocklist

Language-specific:
AdGuard Japanese Browsing Security: | disabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?product_type=ext&product_version=5.1.139&system_version=Windows+10&manifest_version=2&browser=firefox&filters=2.3.7.18.19.20.21.22.208&browsing_security.enabled=false&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=false&stealth.enabled=true&stealth.hide_search_queries=true&stealth.DNT=true&stealth.third_party_cookies=2880&stealth.block_trackers=true)

Оригинальная вкладка переходит по ссылке на которую кликнули. Нельзя кликнуть по ссылке без всплывающего окна с переадресацией. К тому же, в каждом опубликованном видео есть реклама. comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 3 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 3 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

Does the same happen on free videos?

### Issue URL (Annoyance) [NSFW] [https://simpcity.is/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsimpcity.is%2F) ### Comment > При первом нажатии на любую ссылку (или через пару минут), открывается новая вкладка с рекламной ссылкой. Оригинальная вкладка переходит по ссылке на которую кликнули. Нельзя кликнуть по ссылке без всплывающего окна с переадресацией. К тому же, в каждом опубликованном видео есть реклама. Нажимаешь на видеоплеер — всплывающее окно с переадресацией. Попытка поставить видео на паузу — всплывающее окно с переадресацией. ### [NSFW] Screenshots [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/dutckyc2hdcs0g84w44gk48oc0wgg0os2s1mionuao.png?nc=1) ### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser Extension v5.2.112.96 MV3 System version: | `Windows 11` Browser: | Chrome Tracking protection: | disabled Filters: | Ad blocking:

comment.body:
Optimized after several days of real-world testing
This is the latest tested version of ad-blocking rules for SimpCity (simpcity.cr).

- Blocks fake chat popups and intrusive overlays
- Prevents malicious iframes, tracking images, and residual ad containers
- Allows only the Plyr video player to load content from saint2.su
- Blocks known ad domains and popup scripts
- Compatible with uBlock Origin and AdGuard


```adblock
! --- SimpCity Ad Blocking Rules v7.3 Precise ---
! Author: Meki & GPT Anti-Ad Team
! Date: 2025-11-11

! === Core fake chat / popup blocking ===
simpcity.cr##div#container:has-text(/Erika|Cristina|message from|Click here|join me|18+|Hey! I wanna chat|Online chat|Tap here|Click now/i):has(button:has-text(/OK|Join|Chat|Confirm/i))

! === Residual / dynamic overlay prevention ===
simpcity.cr##div[id="container"]:has(img[src*=".com/static/image/"])
simpcity.cr##div[style*="display: none !important;"]:has(img[src*="/static/image/"])
simpcity.cr##body > div:matches-css(height: 250px)

! === Malicious iframe / img blocking ===
simpcity.cr##iframe:matches-src(/^https?://[a-z]{8,15}.(com|net|xyz)/i)
simpcity.cr##img:matches-src(/^https?://[a-z]{8,15}.(com|net|xyz)/i)
simpcity.cr##img[src*="/putjigs"]

! === Allow only plyr player to load saint2.su ===
@@||saint2.su^$domain=simpcity.cr,script,image,media

! === Known ad domains blocking ===
||gijopzgukamg.com^
||qimolzsmojuz.com^

! === Block popup scripts ===
simpcity.cr##+js(aopr, eval)
simpcity.cr##+js(aopr, window.open)
```

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 3 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.14

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

na

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

_No response_

_No response_

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

auditrecording-pa.googleapis.com - this appears to be related to Google's Cloud Audit Logging API: https://cloud.google.com/logging/docs/audit, so it's just more telemetry. I was also able to find more info on it proving this further [here](https://www.scss.tcd.ie/Doug.Leith/pubs/apple_google_additional_material.pdf) on Page 34 & Page 36. We can see: POST https://auditrecording−pa.googleapis.com/google.internal.api.auditrecording.v1.AuditRecordingMobileService/CreateAuditRecord POST body: <binary payload> & POST https://auditrecording−pa.googleapis.com/google.internal.api. auditrecording.v1.AuditRecordingMobileService/CreateAuditRecord Headers x−goog−spatula: CjYKFmNvbS5nb29n...Fwu6/s+CCz+wBKgA= POST body decoded as protobuf: <...> <device details> <...>.

### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.14

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

Mobile

na

### Add your comment and screenshots

I've noticed Google apps on iOS and Android frequently call this domain, I wasn't able to find any official references or documentation on it, but it appears to be used for telemetry based off this [Czech forum post](https://forum.viry.cz/viewtopic.php?p=1552134&sid=78c6f5d12d61596281ce3bd0c0e135c0#p1552134) - annotation=anonymous_feedback_submit_apicka_apkey=AIzaSejQEszExuVHsgk8YElDTlbbrhzeRISc --anenation=anonymous_feedback_submit_url=https://feedback-pa.googleapis.com/v1/feedback/products/1633926/web:anonymous_submit
